text: Мутация яңы генетик вариация өҫтәй, ә һайлап алыу уны асыҡ вариация пулынан сығарып ташлай.
translated_text:
Bashkort: Төркиә өс яҡтан диңгеҙҙәр менән уратып алынған: көнбайышта – Эгей диңгеҙе, төньяҡта – Ҡара диңгеҙ һәм көньяҡта – Урта диңгеҙ. 
English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Bashkort: Һуғыш башланғанда улар күбеһенсә диңгеҙ өҫтөндә сәйәхәт итәләр, ләкин радарҙар үҫешә һәм теүәлерәк була башлағас, һыу аҫты кәмәләре күренмәү өсөн һыу аҫтына төшөргә мәжбүр була. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Bashkort: Мутация яңы генетик вариация өҫтәй, ә һайлап алыу уны асыҡ вариация пулынан сығарып ташлай. 
English: The Germans had a very good radar system, but the British had a very poor one.
clean_output: The Germans had a very good radar system, but the British had a very poor one.

English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

clean_output: The submarines were also used to attack the enemy's ships and destroy their warships.

English: The Black Sea was the most dangerous sea for the submarines, as they were surrounded by hostile ships.
